name: Asha
text: She has experience with water quality assessment, river cleanup drives, and solid waste segregation. Worked on awareness campaigns and school WASH activities.

name: Ravi
text: Mechanical engineering student skilled in pump repair, borewell maintenance, and basic plumbing. Also assisted in solar pump installation.

name: Farida
text: Community outreach volunteer, SHG training, hygiene behavior change communication, and panchayat coordination.

name: Imran
text: GIS mapping, drone-based data collection, and water body sediment analysis. Good with data visualization dashboards.

name: Kiran
text: General coding and website development, less experience in field work. Basic data entry.
